definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
old and respected family/family whose members have been officials from generation to generation
numerous/common people (or populace)/born of a concubine
to be buried with the dead/to die for a cause
to sell, esp. in strained circumstances
to leave one's homeplace (to find work, flee disaster etc)
to carry on/to succeed (of a familial line)/to inherit
